content.p:
ยง 1226-bb. "Upper Mohawk Valley regional water board". For the benefit
of the Upper Mohawk Valley and the inhabitants thereof, a water board to
be known as the Upper Mohawk Valley regional water board is hereby
established for the accomplishment of any or all of the purposes
specified in title ten of article five of this chapter. It shall have
the powers and duties now or hereafter conferred by title ten of article
five of this chapter upon a water board. It shall be organized in a
manner prescribed by and be subject to the provisions of title ten of
article five of this chapter. The water board, its members, officers and
employees and its operations and activities shall in all respects be
governed by the provisions of title ten of article five of this chapter.
